about_the_game:
Alert. This facility is in lockdown. Remain where you are. Do not attempt to leave the facility.

The Kickstarter for SCP: Infohazard launches in fall 2024. Follow the Kickstarter here![/h2]

SCP: Infohazard is a survival horror game, where you take on the role of a death row inmate utilized by the mysterious SCP Foundation to help deal with the most dangerous monsters and anomalies that they contain. When an experiment is sabotaged, you must navigate through the high-tech facility and to find a way to stop what might just be a K-Class end-of-the-world scenario.

SCP: Infohazard immerses you in the inner workings of The SCP Foundation like never before, with breathtaking details, clever puzzles, heart-pounding steath, combat, and more. Use the environment to your advantage as you shoot blindly around corners, scavenge for ammo and resources in drawers and cabinets, knock on a door or window to distract a guard, and more.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood, dread, fear, intensity, psychological horror.
